short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revolutionary browser extension enables voice chat with ChatGPT, enhancing AI interactions. Upgrade your experience now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance ChatGPT with voice commands and speech output. Voice Control lets you converse vocally, aided by a recording button for sending voice queries to ChatGPT, replacing typing. AI's spoken responses offer seamless interaction, simplifying engagement with advanced AI's capabilities.
